## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitcodeabbrevop">BitCodeAbbrevOp</a> - This describes one or more operands in an abbreviation.

This is actually a union of two different things:
<ul>
<li>It could be a literal integer value (&quot;the operand is always 17&quot;).</li>
<li>It could be an encoding specification (&quot;this operand encoded like so&quot;).</li>
</ul>

Definition at line 33 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/bitstream/bitcodes-h">BitCodes.h</a>.
